name: VZZN
description: The first watch-to-earn platform for the people Millions of people are tired of spending billions of hours consuming content and not getting anything in return. VZZN is fixing that and bringing Web3 rewards to the people. Join VZZN Sign up for VZZN, create a profile and tell us your favorite topics to make our algorithms work. Watch Content Watch your favorite movies, shows and other content from the comfort of your own home or on the go. Earn Rewards More content consumed, equals more rewards earned on the VZZN platform. Grow with VZZN. The worlds next-gen entertainment platform. Step into a world where your passion turns into profit. Viewers and creators unite to reap rewards simply by doing what they love. From thrilling sports events to influential streamers, thought-provoking podcasts, and captivating creators. Our platform celebrates every avenue of content.
